Html:
Hello!

It is very interesting for us to know how DynamicDataDisplay is used, what kind of data it displays, in what scenarios you are using it.
This information will help us to improve DynamicDataDisplay.
So if you can share these scenarios with us, we will be glad to get them from you.

You can post a comment here or you can send it to e-mail - thecentury [at] gmail.com

Mikhail,
DynamicDataDisplay Dev Team.
